body:
If you extract the 0.13.2rc1 archive you get:

```
~$ tar tvfz bitcoin-0.13.2rc1-x86_64-linux-gnu.tar.gz
drwxr-xr-x root/root         0 2016-12-20 13:34 bitcoin-0.13.1/
drwxr-xr-x root/root         0 2016-12-20 13:34 bitcoin-0.13.1/bin/
-rwxr-xr-x root/root   2748184 2016-12-20 13:34 bitcoin-0.13.1/bin/bitcoin-cli
-rwxr-xr-x root/root   8873112 2016-12-20 13:34 bitcoin-0.13.1/bin/bitcoind
-rwxr-xr-x root/root  33178960 2016-12-20 13:34 bitcoin-0.13.1/bin/bitcoin-qt
-rwxr-xr-x root/root   3080120 2016-12-20 13:34 bitcoin-0.13.1/bin/bitcoin-tx
-rwxr-xr-x root/root  11049168 2016-12-20 13:34 bitcoin-0.13.1/bin/test_bitcoin
drwxr-xr-x root/root         0 2016-12-20 13:34 bitcoin-0.13.1/include/
-rw-r--r-- root/root      3156 2016-12-20 13:34 bitcoin-0.13.1/include/bitcoinconsensus.h
drwxr-xr-x root/root         0 2016-12-20 13:34 bitcoin-0.13.1/lib/
lrwxr-xr-x root/root         0 2016-12-20 13:34 bitcoin-0.13.1/lib/libbitcoinconsensus.so -> libbitcoinconsensus.so.0.0.0
lrwxr-xr-x root/root         0 2016-12-20 13:34 bitcoin-0.13.1/lib/libbitcoinconsensus.so.0 -> libbitcoinconsensus.so.0.0.0
-rwxr-xr-x root/root    407672 2016-12-20 13:34 bitcoin-0.13.1/lib/libbitcoinconsensus.so.0.0.0
```

I expected this to be in bitcoin-0.13.2/
title: Directory for 0.13.2rc1 is still 0.13.1/
